Claim #1: "Competitors claim better performance and efficiency, maximizing GPU investment and optimizing TCO (Total Cost of Ownership)."

Pure's Advantage: AIRI achieves a sweet spot of performance, density, and efficiency that maximizes GPU investment and optimizes TCO. It extends the power of NVIDIA DGX systems and slashes training job time significantly, making multi-node training simple.
